name: The Ringing
description:
The Ringing

Jarett is minding his business when his spaceship starts making a noise he's never heard before... When no one else can hear it, it must be something worth investigating!

Explore handcrafted levels to find the source of the ringing noise, and embrace your true reality

Created in under a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

Controls Action Keyboard+Mouse Controller MoveA/DLeft Stick (Left/Right)JumpSpaceASkip TextSpaceAFall Through PlatformsSLeft Stick (Down)DashJB Credits Music
  • Empty Space - Thor Arisland (tcarisland)
  • Caketown - Matthew Pablo
  • Memories of a Lost Autumn - Jonathan Shaw
